https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vwqEIL5SrsZFVvileNe9LuHbJy7.jpg Upon the destruction of their ship, Willy is separated from his parents. He lands on a wild and unexplored planet and with the help of Buck, a survival robot, he will have to hold until the arrival of a rescue mission. Astro Kid
